name: semasim-frontend
description: Parts of Semasim executed on the browser

scripts.postinstall: npm run fetch-web-assets && npm run install-all && npm run build
scripts.install-all: npm run i-tools && npm run i-api && npm run i-shared && npm run i-pages
scripts.i-pages: npm run i-login && npm run i-register && npm run i-manager && npm run i-webphone
scripts.build: npm run b-tools && npm run b-api && npm run b-shared && npm run b-pages && npm run tsc
scripts.b-pages: npm run b-login && npm run b-register && npm run b-manager && npm run b-webphone

author: Joseph Garrone
